It belongs to the family Cucurbitaceae, which includes cucumbers and gourds, though it is not closely related to these more familiar plants. The plant is characterized by its delicate, trifoliate leaves and small, inconspicuous flowers that are often hidden among the foliage. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a vulnerable species, facing threats from habitat loss and climate change.
